views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

DarkTintsInConvosList makes Black, Blue or Gray the Tints/Colors of the Conversations List in your Messages Application.

It also gives the chance to Hide the Conversations List View outside. This option is thought to be used for Privacy Reasons.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Credits are on Preferences Panel.

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.7-3 - Tested and Now Fully Working on iOS 11. - Improvements. Version 1.0.7-2
- Added the option to make Transparent the Received Balloons (tip by sinfool).
- Added the option to make Bounce the Messages App (tip by prouser).
Version 1.0.1
- Added the option to make Black the Cell Highlight Selection.
- Added the option to make Square the Balloons.
- Added the option to Disable the Handwriting Keyboard.
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia and Donate Me (thanks so much) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Labels Descriptions in Prefs.
